com.xtructure.xutil.coll
Class AbstractCollectionBuilder<M,C extends java.util.Collection<M>,S extends AbstractCollectionBuilder<M,C,S>>

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.coll.AbstractCollectionBuilder<M,C,S>
Type Parameters:
M - the type of member of the collection to be built
C - the type of collection to be built
S - the type of collection builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
XBuilder<C>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ListBuilder, SetBuilder
public abstract class AbstractCollectionBuilder<M,C extends java.util.Collection<M>,S extends AbstractCollectionBuilder<M,C,S>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements XBuilder<C>

A base class for utilities to build collections.

Version:
0.9.6
Author:
Luis Guimbarda, Peter Nürnberg
